root.title: Lemon Meringue
root.directions: In a bowl, beat 4 egg whites and 1/4 tsp salt. Gradually add 1 cup sugar and fold in 1 tsp vanilla extract.
Create lemon syrup by boiling the juice of a lemon with 1/2 cup of sugar for 15 minutes.
Spread meringue on parchment paper. Bake for 1 hour until crispy. Cool and top with lemon syrup.
